title: George Richard Aiken Endowed Memorial Graduate Fellowship Fund
description: To provide fellowship support for graduate students actively involved with the Center for Water, Earth Science, and Technology (CWEST), which is part of the Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide fellowship support for graduate students actively involved with the Center for Water, Earth Science, and Technology (CWEST), which is part of the Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research at the University of Colorado Boulder.
